channel.title: Lyle Ungar on Gary Weissman, MD, MSHP
channel.description: Recent content in Lyle Ungar on Gary Weissman, MD, MSHP

item.title: Construct validity of six sentiment analysis methods in the text of encounter notes of patients with critical illness
item.description: Assessment of six commonly available sentiment methods trained in non-clinical domains. We evaluated their performance at predicting mortality, and other clinical tasks. Existing sentiment methods have serious limitations with clinical data and should not be deployed to support decision making tools.

item.title: Inclusion of unstructured clinical text improves early prediction of death or prolonged ICU stay
item.description: Assessment of six commonly available sentiment methods trained in non-clinical domains. We evaluated their performance at predicting mortality, and other clinical tasks. Existing sentiment methods have serious limitations with clinical data and should not be deployed to support decision making tools.
